channel.title: Show NPC/Object ID right click 317 PI
channel.description: How do i make my server tell me the object and npc and item id if i right click it? Like this http://i54.tinypic.com/25rmr80.png

item.title: Show NPC/Object ID right click 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“morterdestroyer, post:3, topic:530339”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=649095.msg4363220#msg4363220 date=1379175206]
This is done client sided.
I know because I toggle it on and off all the time with my client.
[/quote]

Ok…? How would i add it to client side.[/quote]
It varies per client.

if(Config.idToggle){ menuActionName[menuActionRow] = "Examine <col=65535>" + class46.name + " (ID: "+class46.type + " / Models: " + class46.objectModelIds[0] +")"; }else{ menuActionName[menuActionRow] = "Examine <col=65535>" + class46.name; }

That’s what I use for object (I have a config.java for my client, and the boolean idToggle is in it).
And I guess I don’t have the id’s for npcs but you could always dump the npc list (I wrote a small snippet in the Private Server Client Hacking section about it)

Read full topic
item.source: Show NPC/Object ID right click 317 PI
